</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">int</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The number of automatically assigned IPv6 addresses and the total number of private IP addresses cannot exceed the quota. This should be combined with the input parameter <code>ipv6_addresses</code> for quota calculation. At least one of them, either this or 'Ipv6Addresses', must be provided.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">

    </dt>

    <dd><p>The number of automatically assigned IPv6 addresses and the total number of private IP addresses cannot exceed the quota. This should be combined with the input parameter <code>ipv6_addresses</code> for quota calculation. At least one of them, either this or 'Ipv6Addresses', must be provided.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ipv6addresses_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_ipv6addresses_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">ipv6Addresses</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#ipv6addressipv6address">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The specified <code>IPv6</code> address list, up to 10 can be specified at a time. Combined with the input parameter <code>Ipv6AddressCount</code> to calculate the quota. Mandatory one with Ipv6AddressCount.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_networkinterfaceid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_networkinterfaceid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">network<wbr>Interface<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>ENI instance <code>ID</code>, in the form of <code>eni-m6dyj72l</code>.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



vpc eni_ipv6_address can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import tencentcloud:Eni/ipv6Address:Ipv6Address ipv6_eni_address eni_id
```
